effect_entries.effect: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Safeguard to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Endure Gen I: Rage)

flavor_text_entries.text:
５ターンの　あいだ
不思議な　力に　守られて
状態異常に　ならなくなる。

The user creates a protective field
that prevents status conditions
for five turns.

Chi la usa crea un campo protettivo che
evita problemi di stato per sé e gli alleati
per cinque turni.

Tormenta de arena de cinco turnos que daña a
todos los Pokémon excepto a los de tipo Roca,
Tierra y Acero.

Ein Schild schützt das Team 5 Runden lang
vor Statusproblemen jeglicher Art.

Crée un champ protecteur qui empêche tous les
problèmes de statut pendant cinq tours.

5턴 동안
이상한 힘으로 보호받아
상태 이상이 되지 않는다.

５ターンの　あいだ
ふしぎな　ちからに　まもられて
じょうたい　いじょうに　ならなくなる。

The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems
for five turns.

The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems
for five turns.

Champ protecteur empêchant tous les
problèmes de statut pendant 5 tours.

The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems like
poison, paralysis, burn, and sleep.

The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems like
poison, paralysis, burn, and sleep.

The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems like
poison, paralysis, burn, and sleep.

It protects the
user’s party from
all status problems
for five turns.

Prevents status
abnormality with a
mystical power.

Prevents status
abnormality with a
mystical power.
